com.facebook.buck.core.rules.attr

Class BuildOutputInitializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.core.rules.attr.BuildOutputInitializer<T>

  • public final class BuildOutputInitializer<T>
extends Object
    Delegates the actual reading of disk-cached data to the InitializableFromDisk and is responsible for safely storing and retrieving the in-memory data structures.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BuildOutputInitializer(BuildTarget buildTarget, InitializableFromDisk<T> initializableFromDisk) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getBuildOutput()
      The initialized buildOutput.
      void initializeFromDisk(SourcePathResolver pathResolver)
      Initializes the build output from the on disk state.
      void invalidate()
      Invalidates the cached build output.
      void setBuildOutputForTests(T buildOutput)
      This should be invoked only by the build engine (currently, CachingBuildEngine) that invoked initializeFromDisk(SourcePathResolver).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • BuildOutputInitializer

        public BuildOutputInitializer(BuildTarget buildTarget,
                              InitializableFromDisk<T> initializableFromDisk)

    • Method Detail

      • invalidate

        public void invalidate()
        Invalidates the cached build output. This should be called whenever the on disk state is about to change.

      • initializeFromDisk

        public void initializeFromDisk(SourcePathResolver pathResolver)
                        throws IOException
        Initializes the build output from the on disk state.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • setBuildOutputForTests

        public void setBuildOutputForTests(T buildOutput)
                            throws IllegalStateException
        This should be invoked only by the build engine (currently, CachingBuildEngine) that invoked initializeFromDisk(SourcePathResolver).

        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this method has already been invoked.

      • getBuildOutput

                 throws IllegalStateException
